title: Weekly Bedford Heights, Garfield Heights, Highland Hills, Bedford, Nor
posting_body: Bedford Heights City Council had a meeting via zoom on Sunday, 06/19/22 at 6:00 PM.
Bedford Heights City Council had a meeting on Tuesday, 06/21/22 at 6:00 PM.
Warrensville Heights City Council had a meeting on the same day from 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM.
Bedford Heights City Council had a meeting via zoom on the same day, at 7:00 PM.
City of Bedford Seniors Club "Grab and Go or Stay" event occurred on Wednesday, 06/22/22 at 11:30 PM.
Bedford Summer Concert Series event occurred on the same day from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM.
There was a high level of activity on the Bedford Heights, Garfield Heights, Highland Hills, Warrensville Heights and Maple Heights real estate market this week.
20 single family homes and 2 condominiums were listed for sale.
15 single family home listings were returned to market.
16 single family home listing and 3 condominium listings changed to contract.
The price was reduced to 5 single family homes.
20 single family home listings and 3 condominium listings began awaiting sale.
1 single family home listing started awaiting rental.
2 single family home listings were withdrawn.
2 single family home listing were placed temporary off market.
